answers.answer: How small? Are they worried? I'm 37 weeks and I have gestational diabetes and we were worried I would have a "fat" baby because he may be exposed to excess sugars, but he is actually measuring about 6lbs 6oz, which they said is about "5 days" behind. I started out at 218 when I got pregnant and I am currently 213 and my doctor seems happy with this. I don't vomit much but my stomach is upset a lot. Also my first son was 8lbs 14oz, babies can be healthy in a variety of sizes, if your doctor isn't worried, you have no need to be.
My son measured 2 weeks behind my entire pregnancy. They never seemed too have a problem with it...he was born over 7 pounds

Im having the opposite problem im 35+6 and my babys already over 8lbs but perfectly healthy she just a big baby. Its her dads falt hes big lol but the want to give me anothe ultrasound on the 29th of this month and based on her growth if shes gotten bigger their going to induce me and schedule me for a Csection because they dont want her to get any bigger.  The whole thing seems wired to me. i wish they would just let her come out when shes ready because my due date isnt until aug 20th.
@emerald9 a lot of women complain that doctors give them c sections for a big baby and when there born there not even close to how big the doc said they were??
If you don't want a c-section tell them. My doctor was telling me I was gonna have a 9lb baby and my son was 7lb 9oz plus he was 2 weeks late. He gave me the choice of what I wanted
She not even a pound yet. I haven't talked to my Dr yet. They referred me to amother location of theirs to get it done

question: I had an ultrasound today at 23weeks and 4 days. Tech said my baby Girl is measuring small and She has been since 17 weeks. I vomit everyday. I've gained 9 lbs so far. I am overweight by proportioned.  Has any one been told this before. How did ur pregnancy turned out.
title: someone plz help
